text: Sixth Form Government is a government secondary school offering advanced level studies, situated on Ethel Street, Saint James, Trinidad and Tobago. At night the same buildings function as the Polytechnic Institute, a night school for adult education. ==Noted Sixth Form Government alumni== * Dr. Deo Singh, ophthalmologist * Senator Jennifer Jones Kernahan * Dr. Bridgette Budhlall, professor * Sharisse Hosein, clinical psychologist == See also == * List of schools in Trinidad and Tobago == External links == * www.sixthformpoly.com - School's Official Website * Alumni's Mailing list the Poly-Tech Mailing list for Alumni Category:Schools in Trinidad and Tobago Category:Secondary schools in Trinidad and Tobago Category:Buildings and structures in Port of Spain
title: Sixth Form Government Secondary School
